    • 方法详细资料

      • train

        public static Booster train(Params params,
            DMatrix dtrain,
            int round,
            DMatrix[] evalMats,
            String[] evalNames)
        Train a booster with given parameters.
        参数:
        params - Booster params.
        dtrain - Data to be trained.
        round - Number of boosting iterations.
        evalMats - Data to be evaluated (may include dtrain)
        evalNames - name of data (used for evaluation info)
        返回:
        trained booster

      • crossValiation

        public static String[] crossValiation(Params params,
                      DMatrix data,
                      int round,
                      int nfold,
                      String[] metrics)
        Cross-validation with given paramaters.
        参数:
        params - Booster params.
        data - Data to be trained.
        round - Number of boosting iterations.
        nfold - Number of folds in CV.
        metrics - Evaluation metrics to be watched in CV.
        返回:
        evaluation history

      • makeNFold

        public static CVPack[] makeNFold(DMatrix data,
                 int nfold,
                 Params params,
                 String[] evalMetrics)
        make an n-fold array of CVPack from random indices
        参数:
        data - original data
        nfold - num of folds
        params - booster parameters
        evalMetrics - Evaluation metrics
        返回:
        CV package array

      • aggCVResults

        public static String aggCVResults(String[] results)
        Aggregate cross-validation results.
        参数:
        results - eval info from each data sample
        返回:
        cross-validation eval info
